title: Project-Based Instructional Design for Statistical Epistemological Knowledge Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Emphasizes data collection/analysis activities through bring-your-own-device (BYOD). Facilitates transition from tacit insights to explicit understanding via team-based statistical projects

learning_goals: Learners can apply and interpret technical statistical concepts (e.g., mean, variance) through project-based learning using real-life data.
Learners can justify statistical reasoning processes through peer feedback in collaborative activities based on the TDS-SECI model.
Learners can structure data analysis results at the extended abstract level of thinking through project presentations.

resources: Online Statistical Tools (Google Sheets, Excel, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
